sys_ux_client_script.name: Refresh landing

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">83125650c5670210243595fa0781f628</macroponent><name>Refresh landing</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if(event.payload.name !== 'refresh'){
        return;
    }
    api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    api.data.evam_myrequests.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_1.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_2.refresh();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-18 09:24:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>8b1256508367021084c61b750d5c2e1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh landing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Employee Suite" source="x_1210077_employ_0">d7add99847230210e560de94116d436a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Suite">d7add99847230210e560de94116d436a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8b1256508367021084c61b750d5c2e1a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-18 09:24:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
